investigate_disappearances.title: The Delegates' Last Stand
investigate_disappearances.description: Delegate Willow's office shows signs of a hurried departureâ€”papers scattered, a half-finished letter about 'concerning Cartel proposals,' and a window left open. Her aide whispers: 'She was frightened about something in the negotiations. Said the Cartel was offering deals that were too good to be true.'

choices.text: 'I need to speak with the other delegates' aides.'
'Return to the Assembly with this information.'

investigate_inside_threats.title: Internal Security Breach
investigate_inside_threats.description: Security Chief Kade reviews personnel records with growing concern: 'Three engineers have access to the navigation algorithms, five contractors worked on the Depths monitoring systems, and dozens of people knew the transport schedules. But here's what's suspicious - seven people accessed secure systems right before each major failure. Someone's been passing inside information.'

choices.text: 'Show me those seven names and their access patterns.'
'We need to set up surveillance on the suspects.'
'This inside help might connect to the other crisis situations.'
'Let me coordinate this investigation with other crisis teams.'
